seasons.name: Summer
seasons.notes: Peak holiday season. Beach, outdoor activities, travel. Festive period overlap.

seasons.name: Autumn
seasons.notes: Harvest season. Wine tourism, outdoor activities before winter. Easter period.

seasons.name: Winter
seasons.notes: Cold weather. Indoor activities, comfort food, warm apparel. School holidays in June/July.

seasons.name: Spring
seasons.notes: Flower season (especially Western Cape). Outdoor activities resume. Heritage Day.

seasons.name: Festive
seasons.notes: Peak retail and travel period. Christmas, New Year, summer holidays. Schools closed.
